code:

if (command.startsWith(“dragonweps”))
{
addItem(1215, 1);
addItem(4587, 1);

addItem(1305, 1);
addItem(1377, 1);
addItem(1434, 1);
addItem(7158, 1);

}

ok if i want only admins to be able to access this what should i add to the code ???

thanks in advance and any help is well appreciated
